name: Deedee's Mayhem
description:
!KEYBOARD CONTROLS ARE AVAILABLE EVEN IF NOT SAID IN THE GAME !
DEXTER : WASD : Movement / Q : Action / E : Bonus
DEEDEE : IJKL : Movement / U : Action / O : Bonus

This game was done by a team of 12 from french videogame school ENJMIN. It is the result of a two-week school assignment aiming at creating a game based on a movie or series.

Our choice landed on "Dexter's Laboratory", a common fav amongst the team and a good madeleine for all of us.

All graphical assets were created from scratch staying as close as possible to the original feeling. Sounds and jingles from the series have been used, but a good remix of the main theme awaits you during the gaming session. Everything was finally wrapped up with Construct 2.

Hope you have fun playing this game, as we had a great deal while creating it!

Cheers.

DISCLAMER : THIS GAME IS NOT AFFILIATED WITH CARTOON NETWORK, IT'S JUST A SCHOOL ASSIGNMENT. EVEN THOUGH WE CREATED MOST OF THE ASSETS, THE ORIGINAL CHARACTERS DESIGNS ARE PROPERTY OF CARTOON NETWORK.
